name: AIsland (HrKaktus)
description:
The goal of the game is to build a settlement while collaborating with an Ai, that sometimes doesn't make the smartest decisions.

You win by filling every tile of the island with a structure, and you loose if you let your people starve or if you make the robot too sad by not doing what it wants you to do.

Controls:

  • Place building - Left Mouse Button
  • Cancel building - Right Mouse Button
